name: 35MM (itch) (ValiantPotato)
description:
35MM is a 2d game where the goal is to make money by selling photos, however, as you will soon discover, developing film is no easy task

You must have an internet connection when launching for the first time, this allows the game to download the latest camera stats

To begin- Buy a camera from the cupboard in the top left, then go on an expedition by clicking the map icon

I didn't test on macos  and linux, but they should work
